resources.string: Scarlet-colored body and pointed nose. In addition to the plant-like features of their species, they exhibit animal characteristics such as a strong fighting spirit and a high degree of curiosity.

Their bodies are a radiant green. When the leaf on their heads blooms, it takes on a star shape. They have several characteristics that distinguish them from other types of Pikmin; one of these is that instead of sprouting from onions, they sprout from Lumilomas, which are only found at night and in underground regions.
Yellow body and a pair of ear-like lamellae that allow them to dig quickly and reach great heights when thrown.
Electrical conductors, resistant to electrical damage.
Blue body and indecipherable facial expression.

White body and red eyes. Their small bodies secrete a potent poison, which in turn makes them immune to it. Their seeds can be obtained from ivory bouncing sprouts that only grow in underground regions.
Robust and resilient body. They can only be born from bouncing shoots found only in underground regions, so they are considered a unique species.
They are a type of parasitic Pikmin called Ermikmin that takes a stone as a host and, similar to a seed that takes root through cracks in a rock, the Pikmin\'s roots penetrate the stone.
Pink bodies and prominent blue eyes that resemble glasses. They move nimbly through the air with their wings, but their attacks don\'t cause much damage.
" A parasitic subtype of Pikmin called Ermikmin. They obtain and maintain their bodies through a process that uses their low-temperature core to constantly generate new ice from ambient moisture."
